name: Battle Challenge - Go Fight
description:
Ride on your rocket car, strike the ball into the goal!

You can win with the goal, you can also get victory through crushing opponents down!

Exciting and fun competitive game, come and try it out!


Game features:
Various types of game mode: Story mode; multi-people free shot, multi-people fight, abundant team league matches, exciting team fight and so on;
Wild western style racing cars, new and refreshing experience; use the resource in the game to reform your car, let the enemy get defeated in front of your car;
Surprise in the game: Get different gear buffs through matches, upgrade your weapon from single missile to various types, use weapon reasonably to give your enemy surprise!
Easy operation: Drag and slide game pad at bottom left to move your car to score through striking the ball into goal; use the buttons at right to attack or defense, the one who scores more will be the winner within time limit, and you can try every means to beat your enemy down to win for sure.

Drive your car on the field!

Defeat your opponents with your great skills!

Adjust angle to strike ball into the goal, win the competitive match on the field!
